Multiple Group Assignment

It it is also possible for an object to be part of multiple groups. The object is considered to collide with another object if it does so as part of any of the individual groups that it is a member of.

To make an object part of multiple groups, use the bitwise OR operator to combine multiple bitmasks.

python

# Set it to be a part of groups 0 and 2
bodyNP.setCollideMask(BitMask32.bit(0) | BitMask32.bit(2))

cpp

// Set it to be a part of groups 0 and 2
np_body.set_collide_mask(BitMask32::bit(0) | BitMask32::bit(2));
